venue.name: University of Connecticut School of Law, Library

item.description:
The Central Connecticut Drupal Meetup Group will be holding its next educational and interactive, face-to-face meeting on Tuesday, January 17, 2011 from 7pm to 9pm in Library 236 at the University of Connecticut School of Law (39 Elizabeth Street) in Hartford, CT, as it continues to build and strengthen the community of Drupal developers, designers, administrators, content creators and other stakeholders in Connecticut. Come meet fellow Drupalists. Come learn what Drupal can do for you and the best practices to apply when using Drupal. Come help steer our group to become an invaluable source of information and networking opportunities. We are a passionate and fun group, enthusiastic to grow and help all those interested in Drupal - beginners, journeymen and experts - by sharing our collective knowledge, expertise, experiences and ideas.

In addition, the group has been getting together regularly before this meetup at 5:30pm for some socializing at Lena's Pizza at 2071 Park Street, Hartford, CT - (Lena's at Sully's), (860) 231-8881, www.sullyspub.com.

The Central Connecticut Drupal Meetup Group meets regularly on the 3rd Tuesday of each month and is regularly announced not here but on groups.drupal.org. Visit http://groups.drupal.org/node/202318 for more information.
item.how_to_find_us: The Drupal Meetup will be held in Library 236 at the University of Connecticut Law School. Enter the main library entrance, 39 Elizabeth Street, take the elevators down one floor, the computer lab is on your left as you exit the elevator.
item.name: Drupal Content Management System (CMS) User Group Meeting
